name: Spicy Shrimp Tacos
author: Mission Foods
summary: Spicy sauteed shrimp are served in soft tacos with chopped mango, red onion, and a drizzle of kicked-up Ranch dressing.
ingredients: 8  Mission® Small/Fajita Super Soft Flour Tortillas
1 pound medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
¼ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes
½ cup fresh cilantro, coarsely chopped
directions: In a small mixing bowl, combine the ranch dressing and Sriracha
In a separate mixing bowl, combine shrimp, salt, black pepper, red pepper flakes, and lime juice
Heat a saute pan over medium high heat until hot
Add olive oil, then the shrimp, and saute until pink and cooked through (about 2 to 3 minutes), turning often to cook evenly
To assemble tacos, place about 4 warm shrimp into each tortilla and top with 1 tbsp
Drizzle with Sriracha ranch dressing and sprinkle with chopped cilantro
Serve with lime wedges to be squeezed over top
